Used on Quick Shop and notification modals.

settings.info: This setting only works with 'Drawer' or 'Notification' cart type

settings.label: Show dynamic checkout button
settings.info: Lets customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

settings.label: Low stock threshold
settings.info: The low stock notice displays if your inventory is equal to or lower than this number.

settings.content: These settings affect the Collection page grid and the Product Recommendation and Featured Collection sections.

settings.label: Show review stars
settings.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

settings.content: Second image effect is disabled when using Quick Shop modal. All effects are disabled on touch devices.

settings.label: Use masonry layout
settings.info: For more information [click here](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/36-product-grid-make-mixed-ratio-product-images-more-compatible).

settings.label: Hide other labels if sold out
New label period
settings.info: Number of days label is displayed after adding a product to your store.

settings.label: Variant trigger name(s)
settings.info: One entry per line. Can be used for both multiple variants and translations. [Learn more](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/213-theme-settings-swatches)

settings.label: Custom swatch colors
settings.info: One entry per line. Names must exactly match variant names. [Learn more](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/213-theme-settings-swatches)

settings.label: Custom swatch images
settings.info: One entry per line. Upload images via Settings > Files in the admin. Names must exactly match variant names. File names are case sensitive. [Learn more](https://support.safeasmilk.co/article/213-theme-settings-swatches)

settings.content: These settings are disabled on elements where the content stretches the full width the browser or where rounded corners are inappropriate.

settings.label: Show continue shopping link
settings.info: Only displays on cart page.
Announce discount codes, free shipping, Black Friday deals etc. Displays on cart page and in cart drawer.

settings.label: Text
settings.default: Announce discount codes, free shipping etc

settings.label: Checkbox text

settings.content: When a visitor views their empty cart, they will be prompted to click a button to continue shopping.

settings.label: Enable predictive search in side drawer
settings.info: Predictive search only displays product results.

settings.label: Search drawer menu
settings.info: This menu won't show dropdown items. We recommend creating a link list of the most visited parts of your store.

settings.label: Search drawer collections
settings.info: Display your most popular product collections in your search sidebar.
